detail_desc: Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves, buttons at the top and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves, buttons at the top and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper knitted in soft cotton with buttons on one shoulder, short slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with a jacquard-knit motif, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbed trims, a V-neck and buttons down the front.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbed trims, a V-neck and buttons down the front.
Wide, high-waisted, 5-pocket trousers in wide wale corduroy with a zip fly and button and gently flared legs.
Jumper knitted in soft, garter-stitched cotton with a hood, kangaroo pocket, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted body in ribbed jersey with spaghetti straps. Concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a shirt collar in woven fabric and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
V-neck T-shirts in cotton jersey. Slim fit.
V-neck T-shirts in cotton jersey. Slim fit.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed, elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Joggers in a cotton weave with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly.Side pockets, a zipped back pocket and tapered legs with elastication and a zip at the hems.
Joggers in a cotton weave with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly.Side pockets, a zipped back pocket and tapered legs with elastication and a zip at the hems.
Lightweight jersey sports hat. Seamless.
Satin-covered Alice band with glittery appliqués and tulle at the top.

Nylon windbreaker with a mesh-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, zipped chest pocket, side pockets and an inner pocket. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Mesh lining.

Nylon windbreaker with a mesh-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, zipped chest pocket, side pockets and an inner pocket. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Mesh lining.

Nylon windbreaker with a mesh-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, zipped chest pocket, side pockets and an inner pocket. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Mesh lining.

Jacket in corduroy with a faux shearling-lined collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and welt side pockets. Adjustable tab at the sides, and buttoned cuffs. Partly lined in faux shearling.

Jacket in corduroy with a faux shearling-lined collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and welt side pockets. Adjustable tab at the sides, and buttoned cuffs. Partly lined in faux shearling.

Fitted, short-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey.
Fitted, short-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey.
Fitted, short-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey.
Blouse in silk satin with a V-neck and wide ties at the top. Long sleeves with wide cuffs with a covered button, and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides.

V-neck, microfibre body with a light shaping effect on the waist and bum. Inset lace sections, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, press-studs at the crotch and laser-cut edges at the top and legs for a smooth silhouette. Lined gusset .
Ankle-length trousers in sturdy jersey. High waist with pleats, a zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastener, and tapered legs.

Microfibre body with a gentle sculpting effect on the waist, hips, back and bum. Push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, an opening and hook-and-eye fastening at the back and laser-cut hems for a smooth silhouette. Lined gusset with a press-stud fastening.

Microfibre body with a gentle sculpting effect on the waist, hips, back and bum. Push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, an opening and hook-and-eye fastening at the back and laser-cut hems for a smooth silhouette. Lined gusset with a press-stud fastening.
Knee-length coat in soft faux fur with notch lapels, hook-and-eye fasteners at the front, and side pockets. Lined.
5-pocket jeans in denim with ultra-flexible stretch that keeps them in shape while providing full movement and optimum comfort. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
